note.p: Birth: St Olave's, Old Jewry, London, England
Education: Merchant Taylors', London; Caius College, Cambridge; MB (Lit. Reg. 1670); Leyden (admitted 1671?)
Career: Rhetoric Professor at Gresham College (1676-1686)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Venn; Hunter; Ward; Innes Smith

Notes: Never appeared on PL; he retired from Gresham College in 1686 so Thomson must be wrong in giving his year of death as 1681. Hunter gives his year of birth as 1649 but BR gives date of baptism as 6 June 1648
